archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Agent Plus Recruit [Sharepoint]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Background :
Agent Plus Recruit is SharePoint based Web Application which is used by Licensing and Contracting team to on board new and transfer agents.
Primary Functions :
1) Consume the Agency approved Agent Applications and enable batch integration with the eContracting (Pangea/GIS) Platform.
2) Provide a User interface to review the agent information about Credit info, History with NLG, Disclosures provided by Agent, regulatory information from NIPR, Resident License information etc.
3) Provide an interface to update Agent information based on the L&C Specialist research.
4) Integrate the Agent information with Agent MDMs, and sales force.
5) Generate and provide Agent Numbers to the Agent Application
6) Provision the Agent in the Identity Access Management systems for them to be able to login into web portal
7) Provide a means to maintain list of values and business specific logic for Agent build
8) Integrate with Agent Admin systems to build the Agents after applying the necessary business logic
9) Send mail to the Agent describing the onboarding requirements and agent logon id.
